entry.title: EKM-4 (panda mobile)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Mobiles
Price: 16.00

Add a pop of colour and fun with this decorative and functional mobile. It is a perfect piece to hang above baby's change station, crib or anywhere in the nursery or kids room as decor. It will make a thoughtful and unique gift as it will bring the outdoors inside to their space with our nature-inspired mobiles.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

disclaimer: This mobile is for decorative purposes only and is not intended to be a toy. Mobiles should be placed well out of arm reach of your baby. Once your baby is able to sit up, mobiles should be removed.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
